featured.text: As the rumor of his scandal ______ quickly during the election campaign, more and more people began to question the honesty of the candidate.
All three _____ seem confident that they will be elected, but we won’t know until the outcome of the election is announced.

definition.zh_def: 選舉，指選民選擇候選人或決定某項政策的過程。
definition.en_def: A formal process in which voters select candidates for public office or decide on specific policies.
definition.example: The election will take place next month.
